      k - transparency level
      Returns:

    • calcGlobalEffect

      private Color calcGlobalEffect​(Ray ray, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      method to calculate all the global effects
      Parameters:
      ray - the direction wh shooting
      level - recursive condition
      kx - reduce the material
      kkx - the intensity of the reflection
      Returns:
      if there are not closest point return the background else return the calculation of the color

    • findClosestIntersection

      protected Intersectable.GeoPoint findClosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
      method to find the closest intersection
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray we shooting
      Returns:
      if there aren't intersections return null else return the closest point

      calculate the specular light according to Phong's model
      Parameters:
      ks - Coefficient for specular
      l - vector from light source

      v - camera vector

      Returns:
